pma:database.name: webphim
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `admin` ( `username` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci NOT NULL, `pass` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci NOT NULL, `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id` (`id`), KEY `id_2` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci;

CREATE TABLE `phim` ( `idphim` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `tenphimvi` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci NOT NULL, `tenphimen` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci NOT NULL, `nam` int(11) NOT NULL, `thoigian` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci NOT NULL, `diemimdb` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci NOT NULL, `poster` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci NOT NULL, `mota` longtext COLLATE utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci NOT NULL, `luotxem` int(11) NOT NULL, `linkphim` text COLLATE utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idphim`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=22 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci;

CREATE TABLE `user` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `mail` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci NOT NULL, `ho_ten` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci NOT NULL, `gioitinh` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci NOT NULL, `ngaysinh` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci NOT NULL, `pass` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci NOT NULL, `avatar` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_vietnamese_ci;
